data.message: After trying so many times to get tickets for his Multiply tour and then again with the Divide tour and getting absolutely nowhere due to the high demand of tickets I've been absolutely desperate to see him live. It would make me so happy and after having the worst year of my life, some positivity wouldn't go a miss and that is more than enough! Please choose me to see Ed's talent shine through on stage rather than through my speakers or my earphones - it would "give me love like never before"💛💚💙👱🏻➕✖️➗
